metadata.name: Growing Your Audience Using On-Chain Data with Adam Levy | OBI #4 #1/15
metadata.description:
One Big Idea Podcast Episode 4

Each week I bring on the brightest creators, builders, and thought leaders to explore the intersection of crypto and culture.  In this week's episode, I sit with Adam Levy of Mint, a podcast exploring the Web3 creator economy. 

We discuss:

-Adam's decision to leave Venture Capital and go full-time Web3

-Lessons learned building the #1 podcast on the Web3 creator economy

-How creators can leverage on-chain data

-Why Adam chose to build Bello Insights

-The Vault, token gated content for Mint Season 6

Not financial or tax advice. This channel is strictly educational and is not investment advice or a solicitation to buy or sell any assets or to make any financial decisions. This video is not tax advice. Talk to your accountant. Do your own research.
